Preterit Intransitive.turoyo: əšmo=ḥreno məd-rafəʕ i=dukṯo d-u=nargo naqla qrifo i=dawmo taḥte w-nafilo
translations: After a while, since the place [where] the axe [was chopping] had become thin, the tree under him broke at once and fell

ʻAfter a while, since the place [where] the axe [was chopping] had become thin, the tree under him broke at once and fellʼ
